records.Name: Demo Quick Action
records.CustomDescription__c:
Simply click the 'Quick Action' button on the top right.
Values here (and from the custom setting & username) will be defaulted with special lay
NOTE: Custom Metadata is not available for defaulting. Resulting record is under Related List.

records.Name: Demo Lightning Action
records.CustomDescription__c:
Click Lightning Action button on top right. This uses the page layout and specific record type.
Completing it takes you directly to the record / cancel leaves you on the same page.

records.Name: Demo List Button
records.CustomDescription__c:
List buttons must use VisualForce. Select the Related List and click 'VF Lightning'.
This uses the page layout and specific recordType (similar to Lightning Action).
Completing it takes you to the record, but cancel requires a Lightning Button Click.
